import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Remove Member from Group"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/groups/{groupKey}/members/{userId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Remove a member from the group with given `key`.

You can find more information about groups [here](../../docs/guides/auth/groups).

>**Note:** Invalidates all [`AccessToken`](../../docs/guides/auth/tokens#access-token)
>because they would contain the wrong group information.

### Tokens
- A valid [`AccessToken`](../../docs/guides/auth/tokens#access-token)
  with [`ADMIN`](../../docs/guides/auth/roles#admins) permissions is required.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"groupKey","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"userId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"date":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}},"title":"ObjectId"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
